column2: The Holdings in §Y$TITLE$§! are all, de jure, vassals of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.

Adopting Feudalism will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Castles. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.

Adopting Feudalism will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Castles. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.

Founding a Merchant Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Four suitable vassals will found Patrician families.
Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has adopted Feudalism.
I can upgrade [Root.GetFullName] to a proper Castle. If it is the County capital and the County is big enough, City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.
I can upgrade [Root.GetFullName] to a proper City. If it is the County capital and the County is big enough, Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.
